# isGathering

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is in the initial gathering phase of the query. (read-only)

## Declaration

```swift
var isGathering: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the query is in the initial gathering phase; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Running Queries

- **isStarted**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the query has started. (read-only)
- **start()**: Attempts to start the query.
- **isStopped**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the query has stopped.
- **stop()**: Stops the receiver’s current query from gathering any further results.
